fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Consumers, International co-operation and development, Customs, Enlargement, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Taxation, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Single market, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Public Health, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Borders and Security
industry_forums: Se participa en las consultas públicas organizadas por la UE.
eu_initiatives: La política industrial, comercial y de medio ambiente en la UE.
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: Participar en el proceso de toma de decisiones de la UE, para que los responsables de las decisiones de la UE conozcan nuestras opiniones e intereses.
